publication.title: The Framework Revisited: A More Detailed View on the IPSEN Architecture
Reuse in the Central Part: The Structure of Logical and Representation Documents, Parser, and Unparser
Constructing SDEs with the IPSEN meta environment
publication.keyword: Graph Rewriting;Software Development Environment;Context Free Grammar;
publication.abstract: We describe a high-level approach to the construction of software development environments (SDEs) featuring a new degree of automation. It combines a variety of reuse approaches into one powerful machinery. Based on suit - able specification formalisms (context-free grammars as well as graph rewriting systems), generator tools, and a framework implementation, the IPSEN meta environment allows the construction of software
